WorkItem.Description: When typing comments beginning with // or ///, the code intellisense seems to pop up and try to autocomplete from all referenced .d.ts files. Ideally the /// comment blocks for references should autocomplete from files in the project and the // comment blocks should not have any autocompletion.
WorkItem.Summary: In TypeScript 0.9.0 alpha, comment blocks trigger incorrect autocomplete

Comments.Message:
This has been fixed https://typescript.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/b4ed60c1f795107030c74bc97fe49cf65ac51c2f

If you update your language service as well it should be fixed in most cases. You may need to wait for a new MSI release before 100% of cases are fixed.
